original_title: Ang Mambabarang at ang mga Taong Pinatay sa Limot
overview: A self-proclaimed messiah moved into a town that is in need of change preached the citizens to eradicate problems to make their lives better and even said to eradicate it in 3-6 weeks. After a week or so, blood flows through the trees, rivers, city town and the citizens are suffering because of the interest of people numbered by just our fingers.
title: Ang Mambabarang at ang mga Taong Pinatay sa Limot
